content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Mister Heine, thank you for showing me the apartment. Can you tell me the monthly rental price for 25 square meters?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
Will you agree to the price of 1000 Euros?

I agree to the price of 1000 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, I'm happy to agree to the rental price of 1000 Euros for the 25 square meter apartment.
name: Juan Mamani

content: I'll make sure to bring all necessary documents to sign the lease agreement on the day of the move-in.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That's great, Mister Heine. I appreciate your flexibility and willingness to work with me. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment and becoming a responsible and dependable tenant.
name: Juan Mamani
